name: MSR PocketRocket Stove Kit
description: A convenient kitchen setup for 2 people, it's light, compact and easy to operate, so you can produce hot food without fuss. Includes a PocketRocket Stove, the Trail Lite Duo System Cookset and 2 excellent MSR Folding Sporks. The whole kit is compact enough for backcountry or climbing trips, with a pot that's substantial and deep for melting snow.PocketRocket Stove is made of stainless steel, aluminum, and brass.Designed for MSR isobutane canisters. (227g canister burns about 60 minutes and boils about 16L of water.)3 serrated pot supports keep the pot from slipping.Hard anodized aluminum pot is durable, non-stick and conducts heat evenly and efficiently.2L pot has a strainer lid.Cookset includes 2 insulated mugs and 2 bowls.
